action.action-desc: Mr. Cohen (for himself and Mr. Burchett) introduced the following bill; which was referred to the Committee on Oversight and Reform

form.official-title: To amend the Ethics in Government Act of 1978 to require certain Tennessee Valley Authority employees to include their annual salary in annual disclosure reports, and for the other purposes.

section.text: Section 102(a) of the Ethics in Government Act of 1978 (5 U.S.C. App. 102(a)) is amended by adding at the end the following:

paragraph.text: In the case of an individual occupying a position described under section 101(f) within the Tennessee Valley Authority, the total compensation (including annual rate of basic pay, bonuses, allowances, differentials, and benefits) for such position.
